comments:
I'm facing real problem while running BIRT within WebSphere Application Server/6.0 on AIX platform (AIX aix03 3 5 0001C03AD300).

JVM is:
java version "1.4.2"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.2)
Classic VM (build 1.4.2, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM AIX build ca142-20050609 (JIT enabled: jitc))

Any help is appreciated.

Stack trace:

Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4096

Hi There,

Could you please provide more detailed info for us to reproduce the problem? Say, the build number of your BIRT, the report document that of problem, etc.

Thanks.
Lin

Hi,

right now I can provide you only with BIRT version - it is 2.2.0.

Thanks,
Milan

Hi Lin,

ad 1) It is very problematic for us to use the latest birt build - the product is already used by customer. 

ad 2) I've found out that the exception is thrown when the input parameter "src" of method org.eclipse.birt.core.archive.compound.Block.read(...) is "-1". Any idea?

Thanks
Milan

Hi Milan,

Sorry but I still have no clue according to the given info. We can only 
diagnose into the problem when we see the report layout or the report document.

BTW,If you cannot use new BIRT build then even if this is finally proved a BIRT 
problem and we fix the problem, you may still not possible to make things 
better in your side for it is unlike for us to backport the fixing to a 
released BIRT.

Thanks.
Lin
As we cannot reproduce the problem. Mark the bug as worksforme. Please feel free to reopen it in case of necessary.
